price: (48) And We had already given Moses and Aaron the criterion and a light and a reminder[888] for the righteous
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ وَضِيَآءٗ وَذِكۡرٗا لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
footnotes: [888]- These are three qualities of the Torah.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā wahārūna al-fur'qāna waḍiyāan wadhik'ran lil'muttaqīna
